title: Design Features of Cyberdelic Experiences
description: Identifying the specific design characteristics that create a cyberdelic experience.

content.notes: Interactive checklist evaluating features: Contemplative Pacing, Minimal Goals, Biofeedback, Inward Attention, Integration, Facilitation. Development pending.

sections.title: Recognizable Patterns
sections.content: Cyberdelic experiences have consistent design characteristics. Seeing these patterns helps you evaluate any technology experience.

sections.title: It's a Spectrum, Not Binary
sections.content: Most experiences aren't purely one or the other. A meditation app might have gamified achievements. What matters is the primary intention and which features dominate.

sections.title: Design Features Serve Purpose
sections.content:
These features aren't arbitrary.
• Contemplative Pacing allows presence.
• Minimal Goals reduce achievement focus.
• Biofeedback creates awareness.
• Integration supports meaning.

sections.title: Quality Varies
sections.content: Presence of features doesn't guarantee quality, but their absence usually indicates an entertainment focus.

sections.title: Hybrid Approaches
sections.content: Some experiences blend both. The best hybrids keep entertainment mechanics in service of transformation, not the other way around.
